name: Black Bean Turkey Burgers
author: jachandl
summary: This recipe makes mouth-watering burgers that even the beef lovers in my family can't pass up! Try it with spinach leaves in place of the lettuce on the bun and goat cheese as a topping! Delish!
ingredients: 1 cup black beans, rinsed and slightly crushed
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate
Mix black beans, ground turkey, Parmesan cheese, bread crumbs, egg, and onion soup mix with your hands in a large bowl
Divide into 6 portions and shape into patties
Cook on preheated grill until no longer pink in the middle, 5 to 6 minutes per side
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
